html:
still last train didn't departure
still, there is time
it's a lot of it to pack things up
but devil lurks nearby
sacrificial blood ignites the altar
smell of flowers fills the air
when i come be ready
when stars glace on night sky
noise in the radio is like a flag
like a lighthouse leads us to our target
they play this song again
the song everyone knows already
when dogs leave to die
and when a bird falls dead
sun gifts us the shine
the dance isn't over yet
title: Dance
